entries.start_convo_1: It is an honor to speak to my master, a true paragon of wisdom. Do you wish to give me instruction?
entries.confused: This pathetic droids fails to understand your august commands, sir!
entries.start_convo_4: Of course! With alacrity! I merely need to know what command you will give me so that I can obey instantly.
entries.end_convo: It is an honor to learn wisdom from your honorable self, sir!
entries.command_reply_1: I need to teach you a command.
entries.start_convo_2: I will gladly hear instruction on any subject from your lips, o master!
entries.which_command: It is such an honor to be at your command, master. What command do you wish me to instantly obey?
entries.taming_toofar: You are too far away to continue taming.
entries.taming_fail: You fail to tame the creature.
entries.pet_wounded_health: I regret to point out to my master that I am slightly damaged.
entries.pet_wounded_mind: I will understand if my master wishes to dispose of my worthless self after seeing the damage I have suffered.
